src_original: āryaratnameghe yathā- “śamathaścittaikāgratā /  vipaśyanā bhūtapratyavekṣeti” uktam /  āryasaṃdhinirmocane 'pi- “bhagavan kathaṃ śamathaparigaveṣaṇaṃ vipaśyanākauśalaṃ cāsti? ucyate /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩依是四種奢摩他、毘鉢舍那所緣境事，能求奢摩他、能善毘鉢舍那？ 」佛告慈氏菩薩曰：

src_original: mayā dharmopacāro vyavasthāpitaḥ /  tadyathā- ye sūtrageyavyākaraṇa-gāthā-udāna-nidāna-avadāna-itivṛttaka-jātaka-vaipulya-adbhūtadharma-upadeśa-vargāḥ bodhisattvebhya ākhyātāste bodhisattvaiḥ saṃśrutya saṃdhārya,  pāṭhamabhyasya,
tgt_original: 如我為諸菩薩所說法假安立，所謂契經、應誦、記別、諷誦、自說、因緣、譬喻、本事、本生、方廣、希法、論議。

src_original: manasā samparīkṣya,  dṛṣṭyā supratividdhaya sa ekākī viviktasthaḥ,  antaḥ pratisaṃlīnaḥ,  yathāsucintitān tāneva dharmān manasikṛtya,
tgt_original: 菩薩於此善聽、善受、言善通利、意善尋思、見善通達，即於如所善思惟法，獨處空閑作意思惟。

src_original: yena cittena manasikārastaccitābhyantaraṃ satataṃ manasikāreṇa manasikāraḥ /
tgt_original: 復即於此能思惟心，內心相續，作意思惟。

src_original: tathā praviśya tatra bahuśaḥ sthitaḥ tasyāṃ kāyaprasrabdhicittaprasrabdhisambhavaśca yo 'sti sa tu śamatha iti /
tgt_original: 如是正行多安住故，起身輕安及心輕安，是名奢摩他。

src_original: tena kāyaprasrabdhiḥ,  cittaprasrabdhiśca /  te prāpya tatraiva sthitaḥ,  cittavikṣepaṃ vihāya yathā cintitadharmaḥ teṣāmeva abhyantare samādhigocarapratibimbaṃ pratyavekṣate,
tgt_original: 彼由獲得身心輕安為所依故，即於如所善思惟法，內三摩地所行影像，觀察勝解捨離心相。

src_original: adhimucyate,  tādṛk samādhigocarapratibimbam,  tajjñeyarthe vivicyate pravivecanaṃ parikalpanaṃ paryavekṣaṇaṃ kṣāntiḥ,
tgt_original: 即於如是三摩地影像所知義中，能正思擇、最極思擇，周遍尋思、周遍伺察，若忍、若樂、若慧、若見、若觀，是名毘鉢舍那。
